title: When a Husband is Critical of His Wife's Weight Gain
itunes:title: When a Husband is Critical of His Wife's Weight Gain
description: Join Megan Wyatt as she answers Wives of Jannah community member marriage related questions from her inbox. This episode addresses a wife whose husband has criticized her for her weight and also doubts her talents and abilities.
content:encoded: Join Megan Wyatt as she answers Wives of Jannah community member marriage related questions from her inbox. This episode addresses a wife whose husband has criticized her for her weight and also doubts her talents and abilities.
itunes:subtitle: Wives of Jannah Question and Answer Box Episode with Megan Wyatt
itunes:author: Megan Wyatt
